name: Hudson Highland Cup

ingredients.item: Highland Park 12-Year-Old Single Malt Scotch Whisky

preparation:
With apple butter, maple syrup and hard cider, this cocktail is like fall in a cup.

Add all the ingredients except the hard cider to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a highball glass filled with fresh ice.

Top with hard cider and garnish with an apple slice.
